name: Sautéed Peppers and Onions
ingredients: 4 medium green peppers, chopped or sliced
10 ounces onion, chopped or sliced (1 jumbo onion)

instructions.en: Heat the oil in a large skillet on medium to high heat.
instructions.sk: Rozohrejte olej na veľkej panvici na strednom až vysokom ohni.
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンで中火から強火で油を熱します。

instructions.en: Sauté the peppers and onion until just tender and slightly browned.
instructions.sk: Opečte papriky a cibuľu, kým nezmäknú a mierne nezhnednú.
instructions.ja: ピーマンと玉ねぎを柔らかくなり、少し焦げ目がつくまで炒めます。

instructions.en: Season with salt, pepper, and other desired seasonings to taste.
instructions.sk: Ochuťte soľou, korením a ďalšími želanými koreninami podľa chuti.
instructions.ja: 塩、コショウ、その他お好みの調味料で味を調えます。
